blog.name: callmepolaris
blog.title: a little favor? Call me Polaris.
blog.description:
Hello there,
Welcome to my blog. I support diversity, so I don't mind how you live your life, I accept you...Except if you are an overbearing unkind arse! Get out!

I love photography and philosophy, so you will find some cool pics and random quotes.

I love powerful scenes, with strong women and a nice script.

I'm not a huge fan of movie theaters. My anxiety hates a room full of strangers and loud sounds...Ironically, because I have been working in the music industry for at least 15 years.

I'm such an easy-going person, if you call me 'ignorant' or wtvr; name calling does not make me read your argument...Try to educate me, I'm open for it.

That's not all, but that's it for now.

summary: Of Course! Netflix Cancels Both THE PUNISHER And JESSICA JONES
title: Of Course! Netflix Cancels Both THE PUNISHER And JESSICA JONES
body:
Of Course! Netflix Cancels Both THE PUNISHER And JESSICA JONES

To nobody’s surprise, because we all knew this was coming. Netflix has canceled the remainder of their Marvel shows, #ThePunisher and #JessicaJones but the already completed “Jessica Jones” season 3 is still set to air and then that’s it, the end after that. This marks the conclusion of Marvel – Netflix’s partnership which started in 2013. Via Deadline, the following is Netflix’s official…

View On WordPress

blog.description:
Nff

Lynn / she her / 17/ prompts and asks are always open

Ao3 is spideyships

summary: I love your work and was just wondering if you could do angst that ends with lots of fluff? Any ship with Peter would work....
question: I love your work and was just wondering if you could do angst that ends with lots of fluff? Any ship with Peter would work. Thank you!
answer:
ALKDZKZS HOLY SHIT YES (I’m so bad at angst but I’ll try my hardest)

Peter loved Frank with everything in him, he loved how tall and strong the older man was and how dangerous he was. Peter loved the way Frank would hold him close on lazy nights when nothing was happening. Peter also loved the way Frank would pin him down to the bed, face down buried in the pillows and his ass up night as Franks pounding in to him both of them moaning. The one thing Peter hated about Frank what the way the fought, the couple wasn’t healthy they were always fighting and screaming at each other and nothing was ever resolved.

“God would it kill you to actually fucking tell me where you’re going for once?” Peter yelled tears streaming down his face as the blurry outline of his boyfriend stepped closer to him.

“Jesus fucking Christ Pete, you know damn well where I am and what I’m doing you just don’t want to hear it. You hate what I am and yet you keep putting up with all my bullshit just to bitch about it!” Frank roared his blood stained hands clenching in a fist as he stepped closer to Peter.

“Yeah no shit I hate the fact that you kill but I put up with all of it because I FUCKING LOVE YOU, IS THAT SO DAMN HARD FOR YOU TO GET THROUGH YOU THICK SKULL!” Screamed the younger as he wiped his eyes and tugged his hair in frustration.

“If you hate it so much then why do you stay?”

“Did you just hear me? I fucking love you Frank, okay I love you and I just want you to realize that.” Peter whispered his heart aching.

“How could you if I’m such a monster? Huh Pete how could you love a cold hearted murderer who doesn’t even treat you right?”

“I don’t know why but I do I love you with everything inside of me, no matter what you do I can’t just leave you.” He said as he stood on his tippy toe to gently touch his cold fingers along the purple bruises in Frank’s face.

“Jesus,” Frank mumbled taking one last step closer to Peter his boots thudding against the hardwood floors. Franks grabbed Peter’s face roughly and brought the smaller man up into a harsh sloppy kiss, teeth clashing and their tongues fighting.

Peter let out a small whimper and wrapped his arms around Frank’s neck as he melted into the kiss. “Please Frank fuck me, please.”

Without hesitation Frank lifted the smaller boy and slammed him against the wall and began tearing away his clothes then his own. It was a sloppy fuck, quick and messy both a moaning mess as Frank finished. Burying himself deep into Peter as he came and wrapped one hand around the boy helping him to finish shortly after.

The night ended in bed the both of them still naked wrapped up in blankets and each other talking in hushed voices as if they hadn’t been fighting just moments ago.

“So what if we just went somewhere you know? Left all this bullshit behind for a week and it was just us on a warm beach, that sound nice Pete?”

“No, you’d hate the beach and we both know I couldn’t stop being Spider-man for a week and you couldn’t stop being the Punisher for a week.”

“Damn, I hate how you’re always right.”

Peter giggled, “yeah I’m always right and you should just accept it.”

“Nah, I think I like arguing it.

“God I love you.”

Frank smiles and pulled the younger closer. “Mmh I love you too,”

“That’s what we should do, a vacation to Vegas. Have a quick wedding and fuck the entire time.”

Peter snorted and lightly slapped Frank’s chest, careful to avoid his bruises and cuts. “No you dork May would kill both of us.”

“Damn so close.”

Peter just smiled up at the man and placed his head in his chest, “goodnight Frank.”

“Night Pete.”

I’ve been looking for an excuse to write Frank and Peter so thank you for giving me the motivation

summary: Jessica Jones & The Punisher Canceled By Netflix
title: Jessica Jones & The Punisher Canceled By Netflix
body:
#ThePunisher canceled by #Netflix; #JessicaJones will continue with season 3 and then that’s it!

Well, it has finally happened, Jessica Jones and The Punisher joins the fate of Daredevil, Iron Fist, Luke Cage, and The Defenders as the two last Marvel series to be canceled by Netflix.

Jon Berthal, the man who portray Frank Castle for The Punisher series express how thankful he was to be apart of the show:

https://twitter.com/jonnybernthal/status/1097523463563005953

On the upside,

View On WordPress
